name: Golden Roots
description:
Submission for GGJ2023 Malaysia! 
Dig for it or Fight for it. Competitive local multiplayer game!

- Local 2 players party/competitive game
- Players compete to dig out valuable roots to gain points in limited time
- Use shovel to hit and stun other player to gain the upper hand!

Credits:
